emergency_warning.title: MEDICAL EMERGENCY WARNING
emergency_warning.not_for_emergencies: This platform is NOT for medical emergencies!
emergency_warning.experiencing_emergency: If you are experiencing a medical emergency, including but not limited to:

section1.title: 1. Nature of Telemedicine Services
section1.description: The Doktu platform provides telemedicine services that allow patients to consult with licensed healthcare professionals via video conferencing. These services are:

items.supplementary: Supplementary to, not a replacement for, in-person medical care
items.limited: Limited by the inherent constraints of remote consultation
items.not_suitable: Not suitable for all medical conditions or situations
items.technology: Subject to technological limitations and connectivity issues

section2.title: 2. Limitations of Remote Consultations
section2.may_require: Healthcare professionals may determine that your condition requires in-person evaluation and will advise you accordingly.

section3.title: 3. Medical Advice Disclaimer
section3.description: All medical information, advice, and recommendations provided through the Doktu platform:

items.based_on: Are based solely on information provided during the consultation
items.may_not_account: May not account for all aspects of your medical condition
items.consider: Should be considered in conjunction with your overall healthcare
items.no_guarantee: Do not guarantee specific medical outcomes
items.verification: May require verification through in-person examination

items.browsing: Browsing the platform does not establish a doctor-patient relationship
items.paid: A relationship is only established during paid consultations
items.general_info: General information on the platform is not personalized medical advice
items.independent: Each consultation is independent unless continuity of care is arranged

items.discretion: Prescriptions are issued at the sole discretion of the healthcare provider
items.controlled: Controlled substances cannot be prescribed via telemedicine in many jurisdictions
items.licensed: Prescriptions must be filled at licensed pharmacies
items.interactions: Medication interactions and allergies must be disclosed
items.followup: Follow-up may be required for certain medications

section6.title: 6. User Responsibilities
section6.description: By using this platform, you acknowledge and agree to:

accurate.title: Provide Accurate Information
accurate.description: You must provide complete, accurate, and truthful information about your medical history, symptoms, medications, and allergies.

follow.title: Follow Medical Advice
follow.description: You are responsible for following the medical advice provided or seeking alternative care if you choose not to follow recommendations.

emergency.title: Seek Emergency Care When Needed
emergency.description: You must seek immediate emergency care for any life-threatening or urgent medical conditions.

primary.title: Maintain Primary Care
primary.description: Telemedicine consultations do not replace the need for a primary care physician and regular in-person medical care.

section7.title: 7. Technology Requirements and Risks
section7.description: Telemedicine services depend on technology that may have limitations:

items.connectivity: Internet connectivity issues may affect consultation quality
items.quality: Video/audio quality may impact diagnostic accuracy
items.failures: Technical failures may interrupt or prevent consultations
items.security: Data security risks exist despite our security measures

section8.title: 8. Privacy and Confidentiality
section8.description: While we implement strong security measures:

items.risks: Electronic communications carry inherent privacy risks
items.ensure: You should ensure privacy during video consultations
items.family: Family members or others present may hear confidential information
items.recording: Recording consultations without consent is prohibited

items.available: Services are only available where legally permitted
items.licensed: Doctors must be licensed in the appropriate jurisdiction
items.crossborder: Cross-border consultations may have legal restrictions
items.laws: Local laws and regulations apply to all services

section10.title: 10. No Guarantee of Results
section10.description: Medicine is not an exact science. No guarantee can be made regarding the accuracy of diagnoses, the effectiveness of treatments, or medical outcomes. Individual results may vary based on numerous factors including but not limited to:

section11.title: 11. Limitation of Liability
section11.description: To the fullest extent permitted by law:

items.malpractice: Doktu platform is not liable for medical malpractice of independent practitioners
items.outcomes: We do not guarantee specific medical outcomes
items.misuse: We are not responsible for misuse of medical advice
items.technical: Technical failures do not constitute grounds for medical liability
items.risks: Users assume risks inherent in telemedicine services

section12.title: 12. Consent to Telemedicine
section12.description: By using our telemedicine services, you consent to:

items.electronic: Receiving medical care via electronic communications
items.limitations: The limitations and risks of telemedicine
items.transmission: The use of electronic transmission of medical information
items.interruption: The possibility that consultations may be interrupted or unsuccessful
items.alternative: Seeking alternative care if telemedicine is inappropriate

items.seek: Seek second opinions for significant medical decisions
items.consult: Consult with their primary care physician
items.not_rely: Not rely solely on telemedicine for complex conditions

items.consent: Parental or guardian consent required for minors
items.present: Parent/guardian must be present during consultations
items.conditions: Some pediatric conditions require in-person evaluation
items.limitations: Age-appropriate limitations apply to certain services

section15.title: 15. Acknowledgment and Acceptance
section15.description: By using the Doktu telemedicine platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to this Medical Disclaimer. You understand that:

items.not_replace: This service does not replace emergency medical care
items.responsible: You are responsible for seeking appropriate medical care
items.assume: You assume the risks associated with telemedicine
